abstract: LONDON, March 23 (Reuters) - Royal Bank of Scotland named the former Citigroup executive Ellen Alemany as chief executive of its RBS America unit on Friday as part of a management revamp to bring its United States businesses closer together.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 23 (Reuters) - Royal Bank of Scotland named the former Citigroup executive Ellen Alemany as chief executive of its RBS America unit on Friday as part of a management revamp to bring its United States businesses closer together.

headline.main: Royal Bank of Scotland Names Former Citigroup Executive to Run American Unit
